item.description:
Join us for a midweek dinner at a restaurant we have been interested in dining at since 2008: Granite Grill FX.  Granite Grill is a restaurant that is both nice and comfrotable with white linen tablecloths, a gorgeous bar and a semi-private area in the back for large parties.  This restaurant has become a favorite of Braintree residents, especially those who live in the surrounding area.  Entrees range in price from $8.95 to $21.95 with the average price in the $15.95-$16.95 price range.  The Yelp reviews do not do justice as I have had only one complaint of the numerous times I have been to Granite Grill.  But, don't take my word for it.  Check it out yourself.  Come on out for a midweek dinner as we try another restaurant new to the SSDOMG. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Wednesday Night Dinner

Wednesday, April 13th @ 6:30pm

Granite Grill FX

703 Granite Street

Braintree, MA 02184

781-848-4500

www.granitegrillfx.com

 

Meeting Place: Please meet outside the front door or at our table(s) after we are seated.

Organizers: Angela

Event Fee: [Current] Annual Members - FREE, Members - $2 each; Guests - $2 each; $12 to become a 2011 Annual Member

Min/Max: Minimum of 6 people by Sunday, April 10th.  No maximum right now.

Guests: 1 per member

RSVP Deadline: 4:30pm on Wednesday, April 13th! Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer prior to the event.  *DEADLINE EXTENDED on 4/12 to 4:30pm on WEDENSDAY!*  No RSVPs will be allowed after this time.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Courtesy of the Granite Grill website.  Let me know if you want me to add additional direction information.

Granite Grill FX is located at 703 Granite Ave in Braintree, just a 1/2 mile fom Braintree's 5 Corners.

FROM Rt 93 at SOUTH SHORE PLAZA
Drive on Rt 37 toward 5 Corners Intersection and bear right toward Randolph keepoing Bertucci's and Panera Bread on your left and Dunkin Dounuts on your right.
Granite Grill FX is located 1/2 on the right hand side in the mall directly in front of the Burlington Coat Factory at 703 Granite St in Braintree.  You can pull in before or at the lights.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the front door or at our table(s) after we are seated. The reservation is under my name, Angela.
item.why: 16 members voted (55% of those who voted) this the #1 restaurant they want to dine at in the 2008 non-A-Z Restaurant Poll. April 13th had a 2-vote lead over April 23rd... and it was time to make a decision and go for it - a Wednesday night dinner!

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Wednesday Night Dinner
